thread.title: Great little boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great little boutique hotel - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: skvc2
title: Great little boutique hotel
text: Fantastic location in the 7 arrondissement, just 4 minute walk to the metro. Safe area. Hotel lobby is very small and I wouldn't leave my suitcase there after check-out but otherwise I cannot fault the hotel. It was modern, clean, good-sized and modernised bathroom. Our room was very quiet.
